variables.helpmsg_1: Use /metronome [name] to target someone with a random effect. Your vote is random everyday (between -4 and +5).
variables.helpmsg_2: Use /metronome [name] to target someone with a random effect. Your vote is random everyday (between -5 and +7). You can also daykill one person every 2 days with /kill [name].
variables.helpmsg_3: Use /metronome [name] to target someone with a random effect. Your vote is random everyday (between -5 and +7). You can also daykill one person every day with /kill [name], and you have a 50% chance of evading kills and daykills.

roles.info: Can metronome one person at night, including itself (Metronome can kill, poison, distract, safeguard, protect, inspect or evolve). Vote is a random value between -4 and 5. ~Sided~

metronome.dummyusermsg: Your /metronome resulted in a distract action!

Your /metronome resulted in a safeguard action!
Your /metronome resulted in a kill action!
Your /metronome resulted in a poison action!

Your /metronome resulted in a evolve action!

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] every 2 turns to defeat another player (you will not be revealed)

tips.Command: /metronome can kill, poison, distract, protect, safeguard, inspect or evolve, and it can be used on yourself too.
tips.Priority: The actual priority is Distract > Safeguard > Protect > Poison > Kill > Inspect > Evolve.

changelog.03.07.2015: Snubbull and Smoochum changed to Abra and Machop. 2nd evolution now possible. Evolving now removes poison.

tiedvotemsg: ±Game: No one was voted off because ~Players~ tied with ~Count~ votes each!
